title: Consumption Behaviour
description: This model is designed to record and track the consumption of various resources such as electricity, diesel, and water over a specified period.

sourceOfConsumption.description: Relationship. The object that is generating the consumption.

startDate.description: Property. Start date of the consumption.

endDate.description: Property. End date of the consumption.

initialMeasurement.description: Property. Initial measurement of the resource.

finalMeasurement.description: Property. Final measurement of the resource.

usersInvolved.description: Property. Number of persons/users involved in the consumption.
